biotools.summary: Normal Mode Analysis, Deformation, and Refinement (NOMAD-Ref) provides tools for calculating functionally relevant movements in biological macromolecules.  This resource provides tools for investigating different conformations of large protein structures, for modeling receptor/ligand docking complexes, and for calculating the associated molecular motions.

bioschemas.name: NOMAD-Ref
